mention_address: "The San Bernardino County Museum, 2024, Orange Tree Lane, Redlands, San Bernardino County, California, 92374, United States of America"
attraction_reviewComments: The standing displays are always interesting to look at, as are the occasional visiting ones. I also enjoy the festivals and things like train day.
Variety of special displays that change regularly. The kids love it when it is dinosaurs. The gift shop is great and always a nice stop in a peaceful setting of a orange grove... read more
In the entire I.E., this is one of the very best place for families with kids. Or for grownups with an interest in the history, geology/biology, and culture of the area.
it was a great time and experience with my daughter daughter. She asked alot of questions and the staff was very hehelpful. I would recommend taking your children.
